places_with_reviews.name: Alun-Alun Kota Banjar
places_with_reviews.address: JGJR+5JC, Banjar, Purwaharja, Banjar City, West Java 46311, Indonesia

reviews.text: This area is located on the side of the road and there are many food such as telur gulung, es markisa, cilok, cilor, jagung rebus, etc. The food is very diverse, but unfortunately I can't find typical Banjar City food here. There is no parking space, so please park on the side of the road or at the mosque. Coincidentally, Alun alun Banjar City is next to the Banjar Mosque.
Hotel Mandiri, bed and breakfast only, room with ac, nice place and friendly.

A decent place to take a short break before continuing the trip .. There are lots of traders too, but during the day many stalls are closed .. The view is quite interesting ,, good for photos as well as for blogging❣️❣️
nice to visit this little city, such a lovely place and peacefully
Well

places_with_reviews.name: Rumah Makan Cobek Beti Lesehan Cipadung
places_with_reviews.address: Jalan Brigjen M. Isa 291 Cipadung RT.07 RW.03 Kelurahan Purwaharja Kecamatan Purwaharja, Mekarmukti, Kec. Cisaga, Kota Banjar, Jawa Barat 46386, Indonesia

reviews.text: Nice place to eat. The sambals is good and the food is fresh. The interior little bit dark even at bright day. They said that the fish is freshly from the pond. So the quality is very good.

Food and service was average for a restaurant like this. Typical for a small town in West Java. Menus were old and dirty but the food was fresh and filling. We have eaten at this chain more three times now and each time there was something not available that day that was on the menu. If you eat there be prepared to be told that something you want isn't available that day.
gurame is the best option, fresh and not smelly, ayam kampung is also delicious, with fresh sambal terasi and lalapan
Excellent taste, delicious recipes, good facilities, and clean bathroom.

Great value.
I like all

places_with_reviews.name: Masjid Baitul Jannah
places_with_reviews.address: JG9R+264, Hegarsari, Pataruman, Banjar City, West Java 46322, Indonesia

reviews.text: Good mosque
Amazing place

The mosque is easy to access, it is on the edge of the main road (Jalan Raya Ciamis Banjar), close to Banjar station. For those who are traveling, it is suitable for stopping to pray or rest. The main room is quite spacious. The yard is large, you can park a car or motorbike. Motorbike parking costs Rp. 2,000,-
After the Isha prayer (19.18) the gate on the right was closed and the mosque door was also closed, the lights were turned off.
There are many stalls around the mosque for those who want to have a snack or quench their thirst.
Cleanliness of toilets & ablution areas needs to be improved. There is an infaq box for cleanliness but the toilet is not comfortable to use. Mosque carpets should also be washed regularly so that prayer is more comfortable, especially when prostrating ☺️

6/16/2023

Tourists who are expected to arrive in Pangandaran in the morning will often stop at this mosque for morning prayers. Large buses and private vehicles also fill the parking area, some even parking on the side of the road.
The coffee and snack shops opened at dawn and were busy serving customers.

The mosque is clean, the parking area is spacious enough for lots of cars and motorbikes. The ablution place for men is next to the mosque, while for women it is in the corner next to it. There are many canteens here, so it is also suitable as a place to rest. After prayer you can eat or drink. The location is in the city, easy to reach. Enjoy!

places_with_reviews.name: Pusdai Kota Banjar
places_with_reviews.address: JGQM+FFW, Banjar, Banjar City, West Java 46311, Indonesia

reviews.text: Good job
ok

This Pusdai is near the Banjar Terminal, there is a quite large mosque, there are toilets, next to it is the Banjar City Regional Library. The parking area is quite large, suitable for cars and motorbikes. Behind it there is a kind of garden for sitting around.

If it's a hot day, hopefully in the future there will be more trees, so it's cool, or coolers will be added. Overall the mosque is good. Keep it even more clean for both visitors and administrators 🙏🙏
The mosque is comfortable, the toilets are clean so you have to pay

places_with_reviews.name: PEMANCINGAN GALATAMA TELAGA SALSABILA
places_with_reviews.address: JGCM+MQX, Banjar, Banjar City, West Java, Indonesia

reviews.text: I came here for dinner, not for fishing. Fishing is closed due to the dry season. It's usually full of people fishing here when it's open. The one with the doctor and the beautiful notary, hehe
great view, can hang out while watching the anglers.
Mango, the atmosphere is nice, clean and spacious, there is another cafe
Keep gassing, don't give it slack 🤣🤣🤣
Joss for those who like fishing for baboon catfish 👍😁

God

places_with_reviews.name: GKI Kota Banjar
places_with_reviews.address: Jl. Kantor Pos No.56, Hegarsari, Kec. Pataruman, Kota Banjar, Jawa Barat 46322, Indonesia

reviews.text: It was a nice church
Christmas celebrate
The church is full of memories. Thank you for every valuable thing I can get. I also learned many valuable lessons here. GBU... hopefully we can meet again another time.
Those who are traveling to Pangandaran but want to worship first when passing through Banjar, can join in worship at GKI Banjar
Place of worship opposite the hometown house
